Module swan.g09.cs230a2
Package swan.g09.cs230a2

Class Ice

java.lang.Object
swan.g09.cs230a2.Tile
swan.g09.cs230a2.Ice
public class Ice extends Tile
Ice is a tile that player may walk on. Player may not give move input on Ice, but can move once landing on a non-ice block.

    Enum used to determine the type of ice block the actor is moving over.

    • walkedOn

      public void walkedOn(swan.g09.cs230a2.Actor a)

      Parameters:
      a - The actor that has stepped on the tile
